  <div style="text-align: left;">[[TableOfContents|Table of Contents]] | [[Doradus_Service_Parameters|Previous]] | [[Cassandra_ColumnFamily_Parameters|Next]] | [[Index|Index]]</div>
  <div style="color: #999999; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; text-align: left;">
    <span>[[Doradus_Configuration_and_Operation|Doradus Configuration and Operation]]</span> : <span>[[Doradus_Configuration_Files|Doradus Configuration Files]]</span> : <span>[[Configuration_Parameters_in_doradus.yaml|Configuration Parameters in doradus.yaml]]</span> : Cassandra Keyspace Parameters</div>
  <hr />
  <div style="color: #4F81BD; font-family: &quot;Museo For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 10pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0LJ0HA">Cassandra Keyspace Parameters</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0KJ0HA">These parameters control the initial creation of the Cassandra </span><span style="font-style: italic;">Keyspace</span> used by Doradus. A single Keyspace is created by Doradus and used to hold all ColumnFamilies used by Doradus applications. When the Doradus server starts, if the configured Keyspace does not exist, it is created using the parameters configured below.</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0JJ0HA">keyspace: 'Doradus'</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0IJ0HA"> </span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0HJ0HA">ks_defaults:</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0GJ0HA">    - strategy_class: SimpleStrategy</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0FJ0HA">    - strategy_options:</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0EJ0HA">        - replication_factor: "1"   # enclose this value in quotes</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0DJ0HA">    - durable_writes: true</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0CJ0HA"> </span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0BJ0HA">The </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">keyspace</span> parameter is the keyspace name and defaults to 'Doradus'. The <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">ks_defaults</span> parameter defines parameters passed to Cassandra to create the Keyspace. All parameters accepted by Cassandra are allowed and are passed “as is”. Note that parameters should be indented and begin with a dash (-). When used, sub-parameters such as the <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">replication_factor</span> passed to <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">strategy_options</span>, should be further indented. Numeric values should be enclosed in quotes.</div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0AJ0HA">When the Doradus server starts, if its configured Keyspace already exists, its parameters are not modified to match values in </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">doradus.yaml</span>. It is safe to use Cassandra tools such as <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">cassandra-cli</span> to modify Keyspace parameters when needed.</div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E06I0HA">See Cassandra documentation for information about Keyspace parameters.</span></div>
</div>
